CN.content:

Paragraph: As the annealing temperature increased from 25 to 140 °C , weak diffraction peaks at 25.4 ° , 27.8 ° , and 29.3 ° emerged , and the diffraction peaks at 21.4 ° and 23.8 ° were slightly increased.

The paragraph describes the results of an experiment involving the annealing of a material, and mentions several diffraction peaks at various angles. However, it does not explicitly name the material being annealed. Therefore, there are no "Material Name" entities to identify in this paragraph.

| 29.3 ° |

The other entities like "°C" and "°" are units of measurement and do not refer to material properties. I have removed them from the table.
